Pre-Game Insights: Scotland win the toss and bat first. Jos Buttler, England's captain, reckons he would have bowled first anyhow. He's 'delighted' to have Jofra Archer back in his arsenal from injury. He'll be joined by Mark Wood, adding extra pace after getting the nod ahead of Reece Topley.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is the first match between these sides in the T20I arena. The last time they met in an ODI, back in 2018, Scotland won by six runs.
